00033 CString DriverLoginItem::getDriverId() const
00034 {
00035     CString driverId;
00036     TCHAR tcharName[50];
00037     MultiByteToWideChar( CP_UTF8, 0, mDriverId.c_str(), -1, tcharName, 50 );
00038     driverId.SetString( tcharName );
00039 
00040     return driverId;
00041 }
00042 
00043 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 const DriverLoginItem::key_type & DriverLoginItem::getId() const
00049 {
00050     return mDriverId;
00051 }
00052 
00053 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00056 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 CString DriverLoginItem::getPassword() const
00058 {
00059     CString driverPassword;
00060     TCHAR tcharName[50];
00061     MultiByteToWideChar( CP_UTF8, 0, mDriverPassword.c_str(), -1, tcharName, 50 );
00062     driverPassword.SetString( tcharName );
00063 
00064     return driverPassword;
00065 }

00067 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00073 void DriverLoginItem::readFromStream
00074     (
00075     std::istream &aStream
00076     )
00077 {
00078     char temp;
00079 
00080     mDriverId.clear();
00081     while( aStream.peek() != '\0' && !aStream.eof() )
00082     {
00083         aStream.read( &temp, 1 );
00084         mDriverId.append( 1, temp );
00085     }
00086 
00087     aStream.get();    // consume the '\0' inserted between mDriverId and mPassword
00088 
00089     mDriverPassword.clear();
00090     while( aStream.peek() != '\n' && !aStream.eof() )
00091     {
00092         aStream.read( &temp, 1 );
00093         mDriverPassword.append( 1, temp );
00094     }
00095 
00096     aStream.get();    // consume the '\n' inserted after mPassword
00097 
00098     if( !aStream.eof() )
00099     {
00100         mIsValid = TRUE;
00101     }
00102 }

00162 void DriverLoginItem::writeToStream
00163     (
00164     std::ofstream &aStream
00165     ) const

00167     aStream << mDriverId << '\0' << mDriverPassword << '\n';
